member.name: T:Urkin.Exceptions.ApplicationSettingsKeyMissingException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a key is missing within application settings

member.name: M:Urkin.Exceptions.ApplicationSettingsKeyMissingException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the missing application setting name.

member.name: M:Urkin.Exceptions.ApplicationSettingsKeyMissingException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the missing application setting name and the exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The exception that is the cause of the current exception

member.name: M:Urkin.Exceptions.ApplicationSettingsKeyMissingException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or System.Exception.HResult is zero (0).
